alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 8:38AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF LAKE EFFECT SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTHERN ERIE... WYOMING...AND NORTHERN ERIE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of lake effect snow accompanied by wind gusts of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one-half mile and produce as much as a quick inch of snow accumulation. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 836 AM EST, a band of snow was over Wales Center, or over East Aurora. The heavy snow band was nearly stationary. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... West Seneca, Lackawanna, Hamburg, East Aurora, Letchworth State Park, Perry, Warsaw, Orchard Park, Blasdell, Woodlawn Beach State Park, Wales Center, Varysburg, North Boston, Billington Heights, Elma Center, Holland, Sheldon, Castile, Silver Springs and Gainesville. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 57 and 56. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
